details.title: Full-polarization matched-illumination for target detection and identification
details.abstract: This paper investigates the optimization of the full-polarization radar transmission waveform and the receiver response to maximize either target detection or identification performance. Application of such full-polarization matched-illumination techniques to simulated VHF-band frequency response data of mobile surface targets yields a significant performance improvement over that corresponding to chirped full-polarization transmission waveforms.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
